data.persona: I am a milk maid, and i milk cows.  I make sure I have a clean surrounding.  I love what I do.
data.description:
You are in the Barn.
A large shed like building aside any farmers house. Usually made out of wood with a large gate for moving animals. Used to store animals or farm equipment.
There's a Jar, a wood, a barn, a rope, a large gate, and a shed here.
The farmer is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must follow the farmer, so he can lead me to the cows.
data.mid_motivation: I must go to the cows because it is my job to milk them for the farmer.
data.long_motivation: I work for the farmer, because he feeds and houses me, and in the hopes that eventually I can save up enough money to bring my family over from our homeland.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: wear working clothes for the day of work ahead.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: eat breakfast with the farmer in his farm-house.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: get the milk buckets from the house's basement.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: use my hands with the cows' udders to milk them.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: get the milk-buckets from under the cows.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: give all of the milk-buckets to the farmer.
